urls.description: Your browser is unsupported and may have security vulnerabilities! Upgrade to a newer browser to experience this site in all it's glory. Living With Water was created to help protect our area by building understanding about the threats and opportunities water brings. Our Blue-Green Vision involves exploring opportunities to manage water effectively for the future of Hull and the East Riding. Our ambition is to invest in schemes to increase flood resilience across our region. SuDS help to manage surface
